com.lhings.library

Annotation Type Event


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Event
    Annotate with event the method that checks if an event should be triggered or not. This method must return a String instance. If the instance returned is null the event will not be generated by the device. Any non-null value will trigger the generation of the event, and the string returned will be the payload (see Payload) of that event.
    Author:
    alessandro ludovici

    • Required Element Summary

      Required Elements 
      Modifier and Type Required Element and Description
      java.lang.String name
      The name of the event that will be triggered by the method annotated with Event.

    • Element Detail

      • name

        public abstract java.lang.String name
        The name of the event that will be triggered by the method annotated with Event.
        Returns:
